entity

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    Table class involves all the information of a specific table
    Since:
    9/11/2016
    Author:
    Shide, Eeyern, Grace, Xi Tong

    • Constructor Detail

      • Table

        public Table(int tableNumber,
             int tableSeats,
             boolean isReservedAM,
             boolean isReservedPM,
             boolean isOccupied)
        Table Constructor will contain all the details of a table
        Parameters:
        tableNumber - The number assigned to the table
        tableSeats - The number of seats on this table
        isReservedAM - Whether the table has been reserved in AM
        isReservedPM - Whether the table has been reserved in PM
        isOccupied - Whether the table is currently being occupied
